data.text: @AbcCollab @IbukunMD Problematic study - students with prior infection were not excluded from the study, asymptomatic infections not tracked, symptomatic counts too small to gain any certainty. This trash will be peddled when they insist masks return because lots of kids are not vaccinated.
@AbcCollab @IbukunMD Interesting article, but outdated. Any data that is not omicron specific is no longer applicable.
@AbcCollab @IbukunMD Becomes? It was always better than masks, but the best protection is being young and healthy.
@AbcCollab @IbukunMD How about you F off my child’s body, Imbeciles!

@AbcCollab @IbukunMD 1) During Delta, not Omicron
2) Vaxxed students were not required to quarantine after exposure, but unvaxxed students were (and likely were required to test in order to return to school) 🤔
@AbcCollab @IbukunMD So now high school students are conducting your studies? Did you share your NIH $ with this child? This is laughable.

@AbcCollab @IbukunMD Also, don’t forget that Dr. Danny Zimmerman was part of the garbage NC mask trial with NO CONTROL GROUP & basically works for Pfizer. So once again, here he is rolling out another garbage study. Other authors should be deeply ashamed to participate in this farce.
